verses.text: \w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 1:1 \ft When rendered in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, “LORD” or “GOD” is the translation of God’s Proper Name.\f* saying, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w*?”
